CustomField.description: What are the primary reasons the caretaker would like the child to attend Connections Academy?
CustomField.label: Why Is Your Child Attending CA

value.fullName: For various reasons, we are dissatisfied with our local public school
value.label: For various reasons, we are dissatisfied with our local public school

value.fullName: Student did not receive adequate attention from the teacher
value.label: Student did not receive adequate attention from the teacher

value.fullName: Student has or had mental health concerns
value.label: Student has or had mental health concerns

value.fullName: Student has or had physical health concerns
value.label: Student has or had physical health concerns

value.fullName: Student was recommended/referred to us by prior school
value.label: Student was recommended/referred to us by prior school

value.fullName: Virtual school will enable me to be more involved with my student's learning
value.label: Virtual school will enable me to be more involved with my student's learning

value.fullName: I am concerned about my child's safety at their current school
value.label: I am concerned about my child's safety at their current school
